## MeAPI.getMe() method

Retrieve the currently authenticated user. See [https://docs.influxdata.com/influxdb/v2.1/api/\#operation/GetMe](https://docs.influxdata.com/influxdb/v2.1/api/#operation/GetMe)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```
